verses.verse: Observe <WH8104> <WH853> the month<WH2320> of Abib,<WH24> and keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God:<WH430> for<WH3588> in the month<WH2320> of Abib<WH24> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> brought thee forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4480> <WH4714> by night.<WH3915>

Thou shalt therefore sacrifice<WH2076> the passover<WH6453> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> of the flock<WH6629> and the herd,<WH1241> in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> there.<WH8033>

Thou shalt eat<WH398> no<WH3808> leavened bread<WH2557> with<WH5921> it; seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> shalt thou eat<WH398> unleavened bread<WH4682> therewith,<WH5921> even the bread<WH3899> of affliction;<WH6040> for<WH3588> thou camest forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> in haste:<WH2649> that<WH4616> thou mayest remember<WH2142> <WH853> the day<WH3117> when thou camest forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of thy life.<WH2416>

And there shall be no<WH3808> leavened bread<WH7603> seen<WH7200> with thee in all<WH3605> thy coast<WH1366> seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> neither<WH3808> shall there any thing of<WH4480> the flesh,<WH1320> which<WH834> thou sacrificedst<WH2076> the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> at even,<WH6153> remain all night<WH3885> until the morning.<WH1242>
Thou mayest<WH3201> not<WH3808> sacrifice<WH2076> <WH853> the passover<WH6453> within any<WH259> of thy gates,<WH8179> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee:

But <WH3588> <WH518> at<WH413> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> in, there<WH8033> thou shalt sacrifice<WH2076> <WH853> the passover<WH6453> at even,<WH6153> at the going down<WH935> of the sun,<WH8121> at the season<WH4150> that thou camest forth<WH3318> out of Egypt.<WH4480> <WH4714>

And thou shalt roast<WH1310> and eat<WH398> it in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall choose:<WH977> and thou shalt turn<WH6437> in the morning,<WH1242> and go<WH1980> unto thy tents.<WH168>

Six <WH8337> days<WH3117> thou shalt eat<WH398> unleavened bread:<WH4682> and on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> shall be a solemn assembly<WH6116> to the LORD<WH3068> thy God:<WH430> thou shalt do<WH6213> no<WH3808> work<WH4399> therein.

Seven <WH7651> weeks<WH7620> shalt thou number<WH5608> unto thee: begin<WH2490> to number<WH5608> the seven<WH7651> weeks<WH7620> from such time as thou beginnest<WH4480> <WH2490> to put the sickle<WH2770> to the corn.<WH7054>

And thou shalt keep<WH6213> the feast<WH2282> of weeks<WH7620> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> with a tribute<WH4530> of a freewill offering<WH5071> of thine hand,<WH3027> which<WH834> thou shalt give<WH5414> unto the LORD thy God, according as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath blessed<WH1288> thee:

And thou shalt rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> thou,<WH859> and thy son,<WH1121> and thy daughter,<WH1323> and thy manservant,<WH5650> and thy maidservant,<WH519> and the Levite<WH3881> that<WH834> is within thy gates,<WH8179> and the stranger,<WH1616> and the fatherless,<WH3490> and the widow,<WH490> that<WH834> are among<WH7130> you, in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath chosen<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> there.<WH8033>
And thou shalt remember<WH2142> that<WH3588> thou wast<WH1961> a bondman<WH5650> in Egypt:<WH4714> and thou shalt observe<WH8104> and do<WH6213> <WH853> these<WH428> statutes.<WH2706>
Thou shalt observe<WH6213> the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles<WH5521> seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> after that thou hast gathered<WH622> in thy corn<WH4480> <WH1637> and thy wine:<WH4480> <WH3342>

And thou shalt rejoice<WH8055> in thy feast,<WH2282> thou,<WH859> and thy son,<WH1121> and thy daughter,<WH1323> and thy manservant,<WH5650> and thy maidservant,<WH519> and the Levite,<WH3881> the stranger,<WH1616> and the fatherless,<WH3490> and the widow,<WH490> that<WH834> are within thy gates.<WH8179>

Seven <WH7651> days<WH3117> shalt thou keep a solemn feast<WH2287> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall choose:<WH977> because<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall bless<WH1288> thee in all<WH3605> thine increase,<WH8393> and in all<WH3605> the works<WH4639> of thine hands,<WH3027> therefore thou shalt<WH1961> surely<WH389> rejoice.<WH8056>

Three <WH7969> times<WH6471> in a year<WH8141> shall all<WH3605> thy males<WH2138> appear<WH7200> <WH853> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> he shall choose;<WH977> in the feast<WH2282> of unleavened bread,<WH4682> and in the feast<WH2282> of weeks,<WH7620> and in the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles:<WH5521> and they shall not<WH3808> appear<WH7200> <WH853> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> empty: <WH7387>
Every man<WH376> shall give as he is able,<WH4979> <WH3027> according to the blessing<WH1293> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> which<WH834> he hath given<WH5414> thee.

Judges <WH8199> and officers<WH7860> shalt thou make<WH5414> thee in all<WH3605> thy gates,<WH8179> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, throughout thy tribes:<WH7626> and they shall judge<WH8199> <WH853> the people<WH5971> with just<WH6664> judgment.<WH4941>

Thou shalt not<WH3808> wrest<WH5186> judgment;<WH4941> thou shalt not<WH3808> respect<WH5234> persons,<WH6440> neither<WH3808> take<WH3947> a gift:<WH7810> for<WH3588> a gift<WH7810> doth blind<WH5786> the eyes<WH5869> of the wise,<WH2450> and pervert<WH5557> the words<WH1697> of the righteous.<WH6662>

That which is altogether just<WH6664> <WH6664> shalt thou follow,<WH7291> that<WH4616> thou mayest live,<WH2421> and inherit<WH3423> <WH853> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee.
Thou shalt not<WH3808> plant<WH5193> thee a grove<WH842> of any<WH3605> trees<WH6086> near<WH681> unto the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> which<WH834> thou shalt make<WH6213> thee.
Neither <WH3808> shalt thou set thee up<WH6965> any image;<WH4676> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hateth.<WH8130>
